situation.name: Situation
situation.description: Defines the name of the situation to check conditions against.

state.name: State
state.description: Requires the situation to be in the given state.

recipe.name: Recipe
recipe.description: Requires the situation to be processing the given recipe id.

timeRemaining.name: Time remaining
timeRemaining.description: Make this condition depend on the amount of time remaining for the situation's current recipe.

storedCardsMatch.name: Stored cards match
storedCardsMatch.description: Only match the condition if the situation contains stored cards matching this card condition.

slottedCardsMatch.name: Slotted cards match
slottedCardsMatch.description: Only match the condition if the situation contains currently slotted cards matching this card condition.

containedCardsMatch.name: Contained cards match
containedCardsMatch.description: Only match the condition if the situation contains either stored or slotted cards matching this card condition.

containedAspects.name: Contained Aspects
containedAspects.description: Only match this condition if all the given aspects match their value conditions.
